about_the_game:
In Pirofauna, you are a tiny Flame in a dark misty forest. You can set fire to anything your tail reaches. Light up the darkness, help lost and frightened bugs, dispel unfriendly creatures.



This is an adventure game where you explore the world, learn the story of the forest, ignite stuff and help those in need. In this forest, fire is a friendly element that flora and fauna look forward to. Once in a while, a small flame appears, which the bugs treat as one of the deities of the forest.



The game is the work of the creator of the award-winning Papetura, Tomasz Ostafin.
The music for the game was composed by Tomas Dvorak aka Floex, known from Amanita games and many other music productions, and sound effects are created by sfx artist Juraj Mravec.

Again, it is made by hand by cutting and gluing together various types of paper. The fire motif is inspired by the creator's own fascination with fireworks, and the bugs in the game are inspired by real species encountered on forest paths, with their own character and habits.



Crafting and coding is in its early stages, so the game still needs time. If you like the little Flame, please support the creator by wishlisting and letting others know!
